VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Precision
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in precision weapons like sniper rifles, the pawn gains bonuses to accuracy.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Close-Quarters
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in CQC weapons like shotguns and pistols, the pawn gains bonuses to aim time.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Gunner
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in high-output weapons like assault rifles and miniguns, the pawn gains bonuses to cooldown time.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Sharp
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in sharp weapons, the pawn gains bonuses to armor piercing.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Blunt
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in blunt weapons, the pawn bonuses to melee cooldown time.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tamer
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in taming animals, the pawn gains bonuses to tame chance and attack on tame failure chance.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Rancher
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in ranching, the pawn gains bonuses to animal gather yield and animal gather speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hunter
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Requires >10 Shooting. An expert in hunting, the pawn gains bonuses to hunting stealth.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Trainer
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in training animals, the pawn gains bonuses to training success chance.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Quality Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in creating great works of art, the pawn gains increased produced art quality.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Quantity Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in creating a lot of art, the pawn gains bonuses to art creation speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Roofer
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: A roof expert, the pawn gains bonuses to roof construction and deconstruction speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Repairman
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at repairing, the pawn gains bonuses to repair success chance and repair speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Architect
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating complex and beautiful buildings, the pawn gains bonuses to the quality of constructed things and to construction success chance.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Foreman
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at constructing massive amounts of buildings, the pawn gains bonuses to construction speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Butcher
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at butchering dead animals, the pawn gains bonuses to butchery speed and butchery yield.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Drug Chef
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating drugs, the pawn gains bonuses to drug creation speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Top Chef
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating amazing works of culinary art, the pawn's food poison chance is reduced.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Industrial Chef
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating massive amounts of food, the pawn gains bonuses to cooking speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Mechanoid Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in all things mechanoids, the pawn gains bonuses to mechanoid shredding speed and efficiency.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tailor
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating clothes, the pawn gains bonuses to tailoring speed and the quality of crafted clothing.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Weaponsmith
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating weapons, the pawn gains bonuses to crafting speed and the quality of weapons.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Industrial Process Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating intermediary ingredients, the pawn gains bonuses to crafting speed of components and can craft them at a slightly lowered cost.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Surgeon
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at surgeries, the pawn gains bonuses to surgery success chance and medical operation speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Battlefield Medic
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at rapid treatment, the pawn gains bonuses to medical tend speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Infectious Disease Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: A disease expert, the pawn gains a bonus to medical tend quality of illnesses.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Driller
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Specializing in using a deep drill, increases deep drilling speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Ore Expert
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Specializing in digging up ores, increases mining yield.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Tunneller
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at digging massive tunnels and caverns, the pawn gains bonuses to mining speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Geologist
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert in rocks, the pawn gains a bonus to the chance of getting rock chunks.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Pharmacologist
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at creating complex drugs, the pawn gains bonuses to drug synthesis speed

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Hacker
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert hacker, the pawn gains bonuses to hacking speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Researcher
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert researcher, the pawn gains bonuses to research speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Forager
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at living off the land, the pawn gains bonuses to foraging amount.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Treespeaker
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Requires Ideology. Requires natural backstory and Tree Connection meme. An expert at communicating psychically with Gauranlen trees, the pawn gains bonuses to pruning speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Careful Harvester
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at ensuring no parts of the plant are wasted on harvesting, the pawn gains bonuses to harvest yield.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Green Thumb
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at quickly sowing and harvesting large amounts, the pawn gains bonuses to harvest speed.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Warden
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at handling prisoners and slaves, the pawn gains bonuses to recruitment rate, arrest success chance, and slave supression power.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Negotiator
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: An expert at handling negotiations, the pawn gains bonuses to trade price improvement and peace talk success chance.

VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.label: Proselytizer
VSE.Expertise.ExpertiseDef.description: Requires Ideology. An expert at converting others to their own ways of thought, the pawn gains bonuses to conversion power.
